content: slouch beanie knitting pattern materials 100g creative focus worsted yarn by rowan i used shade 01660 marine 5mm knitting needles notes -i have used uk terminology for this pattern -the finished hat measures approx 19in around and stretches to fit an average-sized man s head -gauge in stocking stitch using size 5mm needles - 20 sts and 24 row = 4in instructions 1 with 5mm needles co 96 sts 2 ribbed band work in double rib k2 p2 for 5in 3 crown work in st st until hat measures 9in from co edge 4 crown shaping *k16 k3tog repeat from * to last st k1 86 sts work in st st for 3 row *k14 k3tog repeat from * to last st k1 76 sts work in st st for 3 row *k12 k3tog repeat from * to last st k1 66 sts work in st st for 3 row *k10 k3tog repeat from * to last st k1 56 sts work in st st for 3 row *k8 k3tog repeat from * to last st k1 46 sts work in st st for 3 row *k6 k3tog repeat from * to last st k1 36 sts work in st st for 3 row *k4 k3tog repeat from * to last st k1 26 sts *p2 p3tog repeat from * to last st p1 16 sts 5 using wool needle draw yarn through rem sts and fasten_off 6 join back seam and weave in ends if you re using the suggested wool don t pull too hard as it s pretty
